rule_formulation.true: The sentence contains doubled letters at least once.
rule_formulation.false: The sentence contains no doubled letters.

true_samples: She sees the big, green frog on the lily pad
Do you remember the time we went hiking in the tall mountains?
He shouted at the top of his lungs with excitement
I can't believe she agreed to go on a double date with us
The little girl likes to play hopscotch with her friends after school
false_samples: The dog jumped over the fence
The sun sets in the horizon
The book is sitting on the shelf
The child ran towards the playground
The tree branches sway in the wind
